text: Bileipada is a village located in Joda Block of Kendujhar district in Odisha, India. The village has a population of 2,744 of which 1,482 are males while 1,262 are females as per the Population Census 2011. Birikala, Bolita, Govindapur are nearby villages. The PIN Code of Bileipada is 758038. ==References== Category:Villages in Kendujhar district
title: Bileipada
